articles.author: Paul67
articles.description: Brendan Rodgers reclaimed some of his territory disputed by conspiracy theorists at yesterday’s AGM.  The manager explained how transfers worked at Celtic, insisting, “it’s really no different here to most clubs.” The coaches identify the profile of players required, the scouts create a shortlist, and the manager makes the final decision.  Notions than Brendan would [...]

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: MOTHERWELL have played six Premiership games since Matt O’Riley claimed Celtic’s dramatic stoppage-time clincher in the champions’ 2-1 triumph at Fir Park in late September. Amazingly, Stuart Kettlewell’s side have failed to win any of those encounters with four defeats and two draws in a disappointing sequence for the Lanarkshire club. However, Brendan Rodgers insisted [...]

articles.description: CELTIC have been hit with £25,240.45 worth of fines by UEFA following fan misbehaviour in the Champions League 2-2 draw with Atletico Madrid at Parkhead. The Greek-Australian gaffer signed Kobayashi in January after the 23-year-old defender came out [...]
